hadiths.text: Narrated Abdullah ibn Abbas: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: If anyone has a female child, and does not bury her alive, or slight her, or prefer his children (i.e. the male ones) to her, Allah will bring him into Paradise. Uthman did not mention "male children

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي فَضْلِ مَنْ عَالَ يَتَامَى
chapter.eng-name: The virtue of one who takes care of an orphan
